PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Curse on Hit setup: If you only want to use 2 curses, pick either Whispers of Doom OR upgrade to Awakened Curse on Hit. Use Poacher's Mark instead of 3rd curse. If you want to use 3 curses, do both of the above and choose either Despair or Temp Chains as your third curse. (Don't use Temp Chains for mapping).
(Please note: We have allocated Whispers of Doom onto Doedre's Damning as a workaround for Awakened Curse on Hit Support not correctly working in PoB)
If you do not want to use a Curse on Hit setup, simply use Kaom's Heart instead.
